verses.verse: וּבַשָּׁנָ֨ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשְּׁבִעִ֜ית <S%H7637><s%> And in the seventh הִתְחַזַּ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> strengthened יְהוֹיָדָ֗ע <S%H3077><s%> Jehoiada וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> himself and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> the captains הַמֵּא֡וֹת <S%H3967><s%> of hundreds לַעֲזַרְיָ֣הוּ <S%H5838><s%> Azariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְרֹחָ֡ם <S%H3395><s%> of Jeroham וּלְיִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <S%H3458><s%> and Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְ֠הוֹחָנָן <S%H3076><s%> of Jehohanan וְלַֽעֲזַרְיָ֨הוּ <S%H5838><s%> and Azariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עוֹבֵ֜ד <S%H5744><s%> of Obed וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַעֲשֵׂיָ֧הוּ <S%H4641><s%> and Maaseiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֲדָיָ֛הוּ <S%H5718><s%> of Adaiah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלִישָׁפָ֥ט <S%H478><s%> and Elishaphat בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זִכְרִ֖י <S%H2147><s%> of Zichri עִמּ֥וֹ <S%H5973><s%> into בַבְּרִֽית׃ <S%H1285><s%> into covenant

וַיָּסֹ֙בּוּ֙ <S%H5437><s%> And they went about בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> in Judah וַיִּקְבְּצ֤וּ <S%H6908><s%> and gathered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּם֙ <S%H3881><s%> the Levites מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> out of all the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְרָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> and the chief הָאָב֖וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem

וַיִּכְרֹ֨ת <S%H3772><s%> made כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַקָּהָ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> And all the congregation בְּרִ֛ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> with the king וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לָהֶ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> to them הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> son הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> unto them Behold the king's יִמְלֹ֔ךְ <S%H4427><s%> shall reign כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> hath said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons דָוִֽיד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David

זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> that ye shall do הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֨ית <S%H7992><s%> A third part מִכֶּ֜ם <S%H4480><s%> who בָּאֵ֣י <S%H935><s%> of you entering הַשַּׁבָּ֗ת <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbath לַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> of the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> and of the Levites לְשֹֽׁעֲרֵ֖י <S%H7778><s%> [shall be] porters הַסִּפִּֽים׃ <S%H5592><s%> of the doors

וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁית֙ <S%H7992><s%> And a third part בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [shall be] at the king's וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁ֖ית <S%H7992><s%> and a third part בְּשַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> at the gate הַיְס֑וֹד <S%H3247><s%> of the foundation וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people בְּחַצְר֖וֹת <S%H2691><s%> [shall be] in the courts בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> no יָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> But let none come בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> save the priests וְהַמְשָׁרְתִ֣ים <S%H8334><s%> and they that minister לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they יָבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> they shall go in כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> for they [are] holy הֵ֑מָּה <S%H1992><s%> and let וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> but all the people יִשְׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> shall keep מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <S%H4931><s%> the watch יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְהִקִּיפוּ֩ <S%H5362><s%> shall compass הַלְוִיִּ֨ם <S%H3881><s%> And the Levites אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king סָבִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> round about אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man וְכֵלָ֣יו <S%H3627><s%> with his weapons בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand וְהַבָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> and whosoever [else] cometh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> into the house יוּמָ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> he shall be put to death וִֽהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> Thus be with הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> but be ye with the king בְּבֹא֥וֹ <S%H935><s%> when he cometh in וּבְצֵאתֽוֹ׃ <S%H3318><s%> and when he goeth out

וַיַּעֲשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> did הַלְוִיִּ֜ם <S%H3881><s%> So the Levites וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> and all Judah כְּכֹ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּה֮ <S%H6680><s%> had commanded יְהוֹיָדָ֣ע <S%H3077><s%> according to all things that Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵן֒ <S%H3548><s%> the priest וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> and took אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲנָשָׁ֔יו <S%H376><s%> one בָּאֵ֣י <S%H935><s%> that were to come in הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbath עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> were to יוֹצְאֵ֣י <S%H3318><s%> with them that were to go הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <S%H7676><s%> [out] on the sabbath כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not פָטַ֛ר <S%H6362><s%> dismiss יְהוֹיָדָ֥ע <S%H3077><s%> for Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽמַּחְלְקֽוֹת׃ <S%H4256><s%> not the courses

וַיִּתֵּן֩ <S%H5414><s%> delivered יְהוֹיָדָ֨ע <S%H3077><s%> Moreover Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest לְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> to the captains הַמֵּא֗וֹת <S%H3967><s%> of hundreds אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽחֲנִיתִים֙ <S%H2595><s%> spears וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמָּגִנּוֹת֙ <S%H4043><s%> and bucklers וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשְּׁלָטִ֔ים <S%H7982><s%> and shields אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> that [had been] king דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> David's אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> which [were] in the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וַיַּעֲמֵ֨ד <S%H5975><s%> And he set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> all the people וְאִ֣ישׁ ׀ <S%H376><s%> every man שִׁלְח֣וֹ <S%H7973><s%> having his weapon בְיָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand מִכֶּ֨תֶף <S%H3802><s%> side הַבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the temple הַיְמָנִית֙ <S%H3233><s%> from the right עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against כֶּ֤תֶף <S%H3802><s%> side הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> of the temple הַשְּׂמָאלִ֔ית <S%H8042><s%> to the left לַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> along by the altar וְלַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> and the temple עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> by the king סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

וַיּוֹצִ֣יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> Then they brought out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> and put עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנֵּ֙זֶר֙ <S%H5145><s%> upon him the crown וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣עֵד֔וּת <S%H5715><s%> and [gave him] the testimony וַיַּמְלִ֖יכוּ <S%H4427><s%> and made him king אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַיִּמְשָׁחֻ֙הוּ֙ <S%H4886><s%> anointed יְהוֹיָדָ֣ע <S%H3077><s%> And Jehoiada וּבָנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> him and said יְחִ֥י <S%H2421><s%> God save הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king ס

וַתִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard עֲתַלְיָ֗הוּ <S%H6271><s%> Now when Athaliah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the noise הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> of the people הָֽרָצִ֔ים <S%H7323><s%> running וְהַֽמְהַֽלְלִ֖ים <S%H1984><s%> and praising אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וַתָּב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> she came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> to the people בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַתֵּ֡רֶא <S%H7200><s%> And she looked וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold הַמֶּלֶךְ֩ <S%H4428><s%> and behold the king עוֹמֵ֨ד <S%H5975><s%> stood עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside עַמּוּד֜וֹ <S%H5982><s%> at his pillar בַּמָּב֗וֹא <S%H3996><s%> at the entering in וְהַשָּׂרִ֣ים <S%H8269><s%> and the princes וְהַחֲצֹצְרוֹת֮ <S%H2689><s%> and the trumpets עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside הַמֶּלֶךְ֒ <S%H4428><s%> by the king וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עַ֨ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land שָׂמֵ֗חַ <S%H8055><s%> cheer up וְתוֹקֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H8628><s%> and sounded בַּחֲצֹ֣צְר֔וֹת <S%H2689><s%> with trumpets וְהַמְשֽׁוֹרֲרִים֙ <S%H7891><s%> also the singers בִּכְלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> with instruments הַשִּׁ֔יר <S%H7892><s%> of musick וּמוֹדִיעִ֖ים <S%H3045><s%> and such as taught לְהַלֵּ֑ל <S%H1984><s%> to sing praise וַתִּקְרַ֤ע <S%H7167><s%> rent עֲתַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6271><s%> Then Athaliah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּגָדֶ֔יהָ <S%H899><s%> her clothes וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said קֶ֥שֶׁר <S%H7195><s%> Treason קָֽשֶׁר׃ <S%H7195><s%> Treason ס

וַיּוֹצֵא֩ <S%H3318><s%> brought out יְהוֹיָדָ֨ע <S%H3077><s%> Then Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> the captains הַמֵּא֣וֹת ׀ <S%H3967><s%> of hundreds פְּקוּדֵ֣י <S%H6485><s%> that were set over הַחַ֗יִל <S%H2428><s%> the host וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> to הֽוֹצִיא֙וּהָ֙ <S%H3318><s%> unto them Have her forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> her not in the house הַשְּׂדֵר֔וֹת <S%H7713><s%> the ranks וְהַבָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> abide אַחֲרֶ֖יהָ <S%H310><s%> after that יוּמַ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> her let him be slain בֶּחָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> said הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> For the priest לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תְמִית֖וּהָ <S%H4191><s%> Slay בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיָּשִׂ֤ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> So they laid לָהּ֙ יָדַ֔יִם <S%H3027><s%> hands וַתָּב֛וֹא <S%H935><s%> on her and when she was come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at מְב֥וֹא <S%H3996><s%> to the entering שַֽׁעַר־ <S%H8179><s%> gate הַסּוּסִ֖ים <S%H5483><s%> of the horse בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> by the king's וַיְמִית֖וּהָ <S%H4191><s%> they slew שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there פ
